update lsd_repayment_borrow_cash
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
repay_type = #{repayType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
repay_no = #{repayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: select t.*,t1.borrow_no from lsd_repayment_borrow_cash t,lsd_borrow_cash t1 where t.gmt_create >= #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.gmt_create <= #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.borrow_id = t1.id
